医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
集成深度学习模型利用神经影像数据增强阿尔茨海默病的早期诊断用于表征和估计 AD 的集成深度学习 (EDL) 模型的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Ensemble-deep-learning-models-enhance-early-diagnosis-of-Alzheimers-disease-using-neuroimaging-data.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Ensemble-deep-learning-models-enhance-early-diagnosis-of-Alzheimers-disease-using-neuroimaging-data.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfbda964-557b-427c-8562-095f76a866cd Thu, 09 May 2024 08:24:00 -0400 Ensemble deep learning models enhance early diagnosis of Alzheimer's disease using neuroimaging data
可以为想要改善乳汁供应和增加健康的哺乳期父母提供放松干预措施《美国医学会儿科杂志》最近的一项研究探讨了放松疗法在增加人类母亲产奶量方面的效用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Relaxation-interventions-can-be-offered-to-lactating-parents-who-would-like-to-improve-milk-supply-and-increase-幸福感.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Relaxation-interventions-can-be-offered-to-lactating-parents-who-would-like-to-improve-milk-supply-and-increase- well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=830e6c0d-d153-4a7b-ada7-9d4b251cd142 Thu, 09 May 2024 07:46:00 -0400 Relaxation interventions can be offered to lactating parents who would like to improve milk supply and increase well-being
新研究显示，童年时期久坐时间的增加会导致心脏不断扩大最近的一项研究调查了儿童期和成年早期的久坐时间（ST）、低强度体力活动（LPA）和中强度体力活动（MVPA）是否影响心脏结构和功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Increase-in-sedentary-time-from-childhood-causes-progressing-heart-enlargement-new-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Increase-in-sedentary-time-from-childhood-causes-progressing-heart-enlargement-new-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b872b3f-448b-4797-81b9-5182706fd84a Thu, 09 May 2024 07:07:00 -0400 Increase in sedentary time from childhood causes progressing heart enlargement, new study shows
研究表明，妊娠期空气污染暴露会改变胎盘 DNA 甲基化模式产前空气污染物暴露浓度与胎盘脱氧核糖核酸（DNA）甲基化变化之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Placental-DNA-methylation-patterns-altered-by-pregnancy-air-pollution-exposure-research-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Placental-DNA-methylation-patterns-altered-by-pregnancy-air-pollution-exposure-research-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e80019d5-8d41-4c61-8eea-5d2e5473b868 Thu, 09 May 2024 07:02:00 -0400 Placental DNA methylation patterns altered by pregnancy air pollution exposure, research reveals
许多大流行保护措施消失后，带薪病假仍然存在比尔·汤普森的妻子从未见过他自信地微笑。在他们交往的头 20 年里，他的口腔感染导致他的牙齿一颗颗脱落。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Paid-sick-leave-sticks-after-many-pandemic-protections-vanish.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Paid-sick-leave-sticks-after-many-pandemic-protections-vanish.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c66334d7-d702-40ba-8366-f171e465dd49 Thu, 09 May 2024 06:45:36 -0400 Paid sick leave sticks after many pandemic protections vanish
超加工食品消费量增加与死亡风险升高相关超加工食品（UPF）摄入量与全因和特定原因死亡之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Higher-conspiration-of-ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-elevated-mortality-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Higher-conspiration-of-ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-elevated-mortality-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d187a901-0bcb-4038-8b5b-f3097572d631 Thu, 09 May 2024 06:27:00 -0400 Higher consumption of ultra-processed foods linked to elevated mortality risk
新型双特异性抗体有望对抗不断演变的 SARS-CoV-2 变体研究人员开发了针对 SARS-CoV-2 N 端和受体结合域的双特异性抗体，显示出对各种 Omicron 变体的显着中和作用，表明新的 COVID-19 治疗方法的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Novel-bispecific-antibodies-show-promise-against-evolving-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Novel-bispecific-antibodies-show-promise-against-evolving-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=512d8676-cada-48ab-8a05-47cba7dd5dc2 Thu, 09 May 2024 00:38:00 -0400 Novel bispecific antibodies show promise against evolving SARS-CoV-2 variants
产前接触大麻和尼古丁会增加新生儿不良后果的风险最近的一项 JAMA Network Open 研究发现，与不使用或仅使用一种物质相比，产前联合使用尼古丁和大麻会显着增加不良围产期结局的风险，例如高血压、早产和婴儿死亡率升高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Heightened-risk-of-adverse-neonatal-outcomes-from-prenatal-exposure-to-both-cannabis-and-nicotine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Heightened-risk-of-adverse-neonatal-outcomes-from-prenatal-exposure-to-both-cannabis-and-nicotine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f9af20f-b734-4050-af8b-7d9c5b97d7df Thu, 09 May 2024 00:21:00 -0400 Heightened risk of adverse neonatal outcomes from prenatal exposure to both cannabis and nicotine
长期研究显示超加工食品与较高的死亡风险有关大多数超加工食品的较高消费量与较高的死亡风险有关，其中即食肉类、家禽和海鲜产品、含糖饮料、乳制品甜点和高度加工的早餐食品显示出最强的关联，今天，英国医学杂志 (BMJ) 发现了一项长达 30 年的美国研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-higher-risk-of-death-in-long-term-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-higher-risk-of-death-in-long-term-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2aeb1689-810f-4bba-bef8-ce1d70326f79 Wed, 08 May 2024 23:57:15 -0400 Ultra-processed foods linked to higher risk of death in long-term study
一流药物可以预防脓毒症相关的器官衰竭和死亡一种新药可以通过恢复患者血管的健康来预防与败血症相关的器官衰竭和死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/First-in-class-drug-could-prevent-sepsis-lated-organ-failure-and-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240508/First-in-class-drug-could-prevent-sepsis-lated-organ-failure-and-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d10ef972-a564-4528-bed8-3e00556fb0ae Wed, 08 May 2024 23:41:16 -0400 First-in-class drug could prevent sepsis-related organ failure and death
